text: @realDonaldTrump Government should set the guidelines...then the states can fine tune. It seems u don’t know what ur doing to help get the Coronavirus under control. At least Gov Cuomo is trying to help not only his state but the whole country.Listen and take some lesson. You have an inept admin.
